about_the_game:
In the not so-distant future, a mysterious and contagious virus has spread across the world turning into mutated creatures known as "The forgotten " the remaining survivors are struggling to survive in a post-apocalyptic world dominated by chaos, danger, and the ever present threat of the mutated horde.

Plot You Play former military officer and one of the few immune to the virus. Your mission is to navigate through the desolate city, now overrun by The Forgotten. to reach a rumored safe zone where scientist are working on a cure.

As you progress you to collect some source code to override medicine you have to drive

to explore some areas driving experience off-roading the vehicle has capable to load the item you collect

The city divided into different zone, each presenting unique challenges and environments. From abandoned city to underground bunkers and dilapidated skyscrapers, you must adapt your strategies and arsenal to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: : NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • VR Support: Not applicable
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 with 6GB VRAM

  • VR Support: Not applicable

short_description: Become a fearless warrior in Skyward District, a thrilling single-player sci-fi shooter set in a decaying metropolis. Drive off-road, face hostile creatures, and extract valuable items on intense exploration missions.
